mapper.select: select tag_no as no, tag_name as name from gl_tag
select * from gl_video where vid_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') limit #{startIndex}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from gl_video where vid_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

select gl.tag_no as no, gl.tag_name as name, gvt.vid_no as targetNo from gl_tag gl inner join gl_video_tag gvt on gl.tag_no = gvt.tag_no and gvt.vid_no in
#{item.value}

select gl.mbr_no as no, gl.mbr_id as username, gl.mbr_nickname as nickname, gl.mbr_profile as profile, count(gms.mbr_no) as likeCount from gl_member gl left join gl_member_subscribe gms on gl.mbr_id like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') and gl.mbr_no = gms.mbr_no group by gms.mbr_no limit #{startIndex}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from gl_member where mbr_id like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
select gl.*, gm.mbr_nickname from gl_loadmap gl inner join gl_member gm on ldm_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') and gl.mbr_no = gm.mbr_no limit #{startIndex}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from gl_loadmap where ldm_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

select sub1.*, sub2.likeCount from ( ( select gc.*, gm.mbr_nickname from gl_course gc inner join gl_member gm on gc.cos_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') and gc.mbr_no = gm.mbr_no ) sub1 left join ( select cos_no, count(cos_no) as likeCount from gl_course_like group by cos_no ) sub2 on sub1.cos_no = sub2.cos_no )
select count(*) from gl_course where cos_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

select gl.tag_no as no, gl.tag_name as name, gct.cos_no as targetNo from gl_tag gl inner join gl_course_tag gct on gl.tag_no = gct.tag_no and gct.cos_no in
